item.title: About me
item.description: Hello, my name is Alexander Sizov and this is my website. It is some kind of blog and wiki, which I use to store non-sensitive data. I am not a native english speaker, so there will be many errors. Please, forgive me - and make a pull requests about them on github, if you can.
